I am well travelled Singaporean mural artist who is looking for walls to paint outdoors. 
 
I would be happy to do it pro-bono especially if it is for a good cause. 
 
Please browse through my works here --- > www.wolfalice.carbonmade.com 
 
Drop me a message, and we can discuss more!
title: Give me a wall, I'll paint you a mural for free

QR Code Link to This Post 
  
 
ArtSceneToday is currently accepting submissions for our current International Juried Competition. All entries are exhibited on our homepage slideshow from the moment you enter. Our online competitions recognize excellence in the visual arts among emerging artists from around the world. AND The 1st Place Winner in our online art competition will get an Art Scene Today website + hosting for 1 yr. 
 
THEME: A STICH IN TIME...a 21st century look at textile and fabric art that challenges old traditions. 
 
 DEADLINE: Monday, February 20, 2017. The sooner you enter, the sooner your artwork appears on our homepage. 
 
 CALL FOR ENTRIES:  http://artscenetoday.com
title: International Call for Entries

We provide various platforms for our artists to perform like: Company's Dinner & Dance, Themed Parties, Festive Shows and etc. 
 
Don't waste your talents at home or in the bathroom. Contact us now! 
 
Criteria:  
- Passionate in Singing is a must!  
- No age limit 
- No experience required 
- Good attitude and personality 
- Willing to commit for rehearsals (if selected)  
- Able to work as a team 
 
Call or Text 9734 5915 for audition with your Name / Age/ Gender / Occupation.
title: A Platform to showcase you TALENT!
